items.summary: This update modifies the IAccessUrl model and the Manage.vue component to utilize the new url_with_auth from the backend instead of the previous access_url+path. items.summary: This update fixes the polling loop and the deployment status endpoint to ensure that the `url_with_auth` from `access_urls` is preserved. items.title: Enhance Ingress Config with Auth Support in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces support for token-based authentication in ingress configurations by adding `auth_param` and `auth_env` fields. These changes allow for more flexible URL generation, enabling the inclusion of authentication tokens directly in the URL. The modifications enhance security and usability for deployments.

items.title: Enhance Deployment with Auto Environment Support in Backend ðŸš€
items.summary: This update introduces a generic deployment mechanism by replacing the hardcoded gateway token with a flexible auto_env schema. Key modifications were made in the deployment utility and application view files, improving the deployment process and logging. These changes enhance the adaptability of the deployment configurations for various environments.

items.title: Enhance CJK Font Support for WeChat in Wisdom ðŸŽ¨
items.summary: This update resolves the issue of blank text rendering in WeChat when running under Wine by adding CJK font aliases. The Dockerfile now includes a command to run `winetricks fakechinese`, ensuring that Windows Chinese font names are properly mapped to the installed Linux fonts. Additionally, a migration script in the entrypoint.sh file ensures existing pods are updated with the new font configuration.
